title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.18 - Requirement to attend aircraft while engines running
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.18 - Requirement to attend aircraft while engines running

State Regulations

No person shall leave an aircraft, or its controls
unattended while the aircraft's engines are running. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
